thread.section_title: Park South Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent service .Great location
thread.title_full: Excellent service .Great location - Review of Park South Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: KD1Toronto
title: Excellent service .Great location
text:
The staff went above and beyond to make our birthday stay special.
Booking restaurant reservations, leaving us a half bottle of wine and chocolates,
giving us a lovely room. Love the friendly doormen and also enjoyed the cozy lobby
area and fireplace. Ate at Covinas Friday night. Dinner was great, but a very busy and noisy
evening on St Patrick's Day! Being steps to the subway was convenient. Shops nearby for wine,
deli, drugstore, etc. Also fantastic selection of Indian restaurants. Our third stay at the Park South.
